title: Accordion
description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

title: Alert Dialog
description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

title: Alert
description: Displays a callout for user attention.

title: Aspect Ratio
description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

title: Avatar
description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

title: Badge
description: Displays a small amount of information like a status or a numerical value.

title: Breadcrumb
description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links.

title: Button Group
description: Groups a series of buttons together on a single line.

title: Button
description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

title: Calendar
description: A date field component that allows users to enter and edit dates.

title: Card
description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

title: Carousel
description: A slideshow component for cycling through elements.

title: Chart
description: Beautifully designed charts using Recharts.

title: Checkbox
description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and unchecked.

title: Collapsible
description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

title: Combobox
description: Autocomplete input and command palette with a list of suggestions.

title: Command
description: Fast, composable, unstyled command menu for React.

title: Context Menu
description: Displays a menu located at the pointer, triggered by a right-click.

title: Data Table
description: Powerful table and datagrid built using TanStack Table.

title: Date Picker
description: A widget which allows users to select a date from a calendar.

title: Dialog
description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.

title: Drawer
description: A panel that slides out from the edge of the screen.

title: Dropdown Menu
description: Displays a list of options to the user — triggered by a button.

title: Empty
description: A placeholder component for when no data is available.

title: Field
description: A wrapper for form controls to provide labels and validation messages.

title: Form
description: Building forms with React Hook Form and Zod validation.

title: Hover Card
description: For card previews that appear on hover for sighted users.

title: Input Group
description: A container for grouping input fields with icons or buttons.

title: Input OTP
description: Accessible one-time password input with customizable slots.

title: Input
description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.

title: Item
description: A generic item component for lists or grids.

title: Kbd
description: Displays which key or combination of keys performs a shortcut.

title: Label
description: Renders an accessible label associated with a form control.

title: Menubar
description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications.

title: Native Select
description: A standard HTML select element styled for shadcn.

title: Navigation Menu
description: A collection of links for navigating websites.

title: Pagination
description: Navigation for spanning content across multiple pages.

title: Popover
description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

title: Progress
description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.

title: Radio Group
description: A set of checkable buttons where only one can be checked at a time.

title: Resizable
description: Accessible resizable panel groups and layouts.

title: Scroll Area
description: Augments native scroll functionality with custom-styled scrollbars.

title: Select
description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

title: Separator
description: Visually or semantically separates content.

title: Sheet
description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main screen.

title: Sidebar
description: A composable, mobile-friendly sidebar component.

title: Skeleton
description: Used to show a placeholder while content is loading.

title: Slider
description: An input where the user selects a value from a range.

title: Sonner
description: An opinionated toast component for React.

title: Spinner
description: An animated loading indicator.

title: Switch
description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and unchecked.

title: Table
description: A responsive table component.

title: Tabs
description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

title: Textarea
description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.

title: Toast
description: A succinct message that is displayed temporarily.

title: Toggle Group
description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

title: Toggle
description: A two-state button that can be either off or on.

title: Tooltip
description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

title: Typography
description: Styles for headings, paragraphs, lists, and more.
